insert into DYN_TEMPLATE( ID , LAST_UPDATE_DATE , CREATED_BY , CREATION_DATE , VERSION , LAST_UPDATE_IP , LAST_UPDATED_BY , TEM_TITLE , TEM_NOTICE , TEM_TEXT , TEM_SHOULD_INVEST_NUM , TEM_ACTUAL_INVEST_NUM , TEM_LOGIN_NUM , TEM_SCENE_NUM , TEM_TYPE , TEM_STATE , ORG_IDENTITY )
select #{item.id,jdbcType = VARCHAR} , #{item.lastUpdateDate,jdbcType = TIMESTAMP} , #{item.createdBy,jdbcType = VARCHAR} , #{item.creationDate,jdbcType = TIMESTAMP} , #{item.version,jdbcType = DECIMAL} , #{item.lastUpdateIp,jdbcType = VARCHAR} , #{item.lastUpdatedBy,jdbcType = VARCHAR} , #{item.temTitle,jdbcType = VARCHAR} , #{item.temNotice,jdbcType = VARCHAR} , #{item.temText,jdbcType = VARCHAR} , #{item.temShouldInvestNum,jdbcType = DECIMAL} , #{item.temActualInvestNum,jdbcType = DECIMAL} , #{item.temLoginNum,jdbcType = DECIMAL} , #{item.temSceneNum,jdbcType = DECIMAL} , #{item.temType,jdbcType = DECIMAL} , #{item.temState,jdbcType = DECIMAL} , #{item.orgIdentity,jdbcType = VARCHAR} from dual
mapper.update:
update DYN_TEMPLATE
ID = #{id,jdbcType = VARCHAR} ,
LAST_UPDATE_DATE = #{lastUpdateDate,jdbcType = TIMESTAMP} ,
CREATED_BY = #{createdBy,jdbcType = VARCHAR} ,
CREATION_DATE = #{creationDate,jdbcType = TIMESTAMP} ,
VERSION = version+1 ,
LAST_UPDATE_IP = #{lastUpdateIp,jdbcType = VARCHAR} ,
LAST_UPDATED_BY = #{lastUpdatedBy,jdbcType = VARCHAR} ,
TEM_TITLE = #{temTitle,jdbcType = VARCHAR} ,
TEM_NOTICE = #{temNotice,jdbcType = VARCHAR} ,
TEM_TEXT = #{temText,jdbcType = VARCHAR} ,
TEM_SHOULD_INVEST_NUM = #{temShouldInvestNum,jdbcType = DECIMAL} ,
TEM_ACTUAL_INVEST_NUM = #{temActualInvestNum,jdbcType = DECIMAL} ,
TEM_LOGIN_NUM = #{temLoginNum,jdbcType = DECIMAL} ,
TEM_SCENE_NUM = #{temSceneNum,jdbcType = DECIMAL} ,
TEM_TYPE = #{temType,jdbcType = DECIMAL} ,
TEM_STATE = #{temState,jdbcType = DECIMAL} ,
ORG_IDENTITY = #{orgIdentity,jdbcType = VARCHAR}
where id = #{id} and version = #{version}

update DYN_TEMPLATE set ID = #{id,jdbcType = VARCHAR} , LAST_UPDATE_DATE = #{lastUpdateDate,jdbcType = TIMESTAMP} , CREATED_BY = #{createdBy,jdbcType = VARCHAR} , CREATION_DATE = #{creationDate,jdbcType = TIMESTAMP} , VERSION = version+1 , LAST_UPDATE_IP = #{lastUpdateIp,jdbcType = VARCHAR} , LAST_UPDATED_BY = #{lastUpdatedBy,jdbcType = VARCHAR} , TEM_TITLE = #{temTitle,jdbcType = VARCHAR} , TEM_NOTICE = #{temNotice,jdbcType = VARCHAR} , TEM_TEXT = #{temText,jdbcType = VARCHAR} , TEM_SHOULD_INVEST_NUM = #{temShouldInvestNum,jdbcType = DECIMAL} , TEM_ACTUAL_INVEST_NUM = #{temActualInvestNum,jdbcType = DECIMAL} , TEM_LOGIN_NUM = #{temLoginNum,jdbcType = DECIMAL} , TEM_SCENE_NUM = #{temSceneNum,jdbcType = DECIMAL} , TEM_TYPE = #{temType,jdbcType = DECIMAL} , TEM_STATE = #{temState,jdbcType = DECIMAL} , ORG_IDENTITY = #{orgIdentity,jdbcType = VARCHAR} where id = #{id} and version = #{version}

update.foreach: update DYN_TEMPLATE set ID = #{item.id,jdbcType = VARCHAR} , LAST_UPDATE_DATE = #{item.lastUpdateDate,jdbcType = TIMESTAMP} , CREATED_BY = #{item.createdBy,jdbcType = VARCHAR} , CREATION_DATE = #{item.creationDate,jdbcType = TIMESTAMP} , VERSION = version+1 , LAST_UPDATE_IP = #{item.lastUpdateIp,jdbcType = VARCHAR} , LAST_UPDATED_BY = #{item.lastUpdatedBy,jdbcType = VARCHAR} , TEM_TITLE = #{item.temTitle,jdbcType = VARCHAR} , TEM_NOTICE = #{item.temNotice,jdbcType = VARCHAR} , TEM_TEXT = #{item.temText,jdbcType = VARCHAR} , TEM_SHOULD_INVEST_NUM = #{item.temShouldInvestNum,jdbcType = DECIMAL} , TEM_ACTUAL_INVEST_NUM = #{item.temActualInvestNum,jdbcType = DECIMAL} , TEM_LOGIN_NUM = #{item.temLoginNum,jdbcType = DECIMAL} , TEM_SCENE_NUM = #{item.temSceneNum,jdbcType = DECIMAL} , TEM_TYPE = #{item.temType,jdbcType = DECIMAL} , TEM_STATE = #{item.temState,jdbcType = DECIMAL} , ORG_IDENTITY = #{item.orgIdentity,jdbcType = VARCHAR} where id = #{item.id} and version = #{version}

mapper.select: select RE_ID as "reId", RE_NAME as "reName", RE_RULE as "reRule" from DYN_RECORD
select * from DYN_TEMPLATE dt,DYN_TEM_ITEM dti WHERE dt.ID = dti.TEM_ID and dt.ID =#{id}
